Written by Federico Fellini and Roberto Rossellini from stories by Victor Haines, Marcello Pagliero, Sergio Amidei, Federico Fellini, Roberto Rossellini, and Vasco Pratolini (in the Florence episode; uncredited); English dialogue by Anna Limentani; camera, Otello Martelli; editor, Eraldo da Roma; music, Renzo Rossellini.
